long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improved utilisation tracking on NetSuite timesheets.

NetSuite Utilisation Tracker is a Chrome extension which helps NetSuite partners visually see a breakdown of billable percentages across their timesheets. It provides visibility of billable time as a percentage across the week as well as daily. 

Features:

- View a total of billable time & percentage across the week.
- Visualise billable percentage throughout each day.
- Control which non billable tasks should count towards utilisation.
- Colour code utilisation to see visually when targets are met.
